text: James Price McLane Jr. (September 13, 1930 â€“ December 13, 2020) was an American competition swimmer. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. McLane won two golds and a silver medal at the 1948 Summer Olympics and one gold medal at the 1952 Summer Olympics. McLane died at his home in Ipswich, Massachusetts on December 13, 2020, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American swimmers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Jimmy McLane
